page.title: 14Shevington Library
page.content: The new library building was opened in October 1970. It is open 5 days a week - Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 10am. to 12.30pm. and 1pm. to 7pm. Thursday's times are similar, but the library closes at 5pm. and on Saturdays it opens for the first session only. This is the busiest day, patronised mainly by fathers and children. There are 3566 adult and 1550 child members. Children may borrow 3 books up to 11, and 5 thereafter. There are 10171 adult non-fiction, 8653 fiction, 1861 junior non-fiction, 1402 fiction and 328 reference books. Most popular adult authors are Catherine Cookson and Barbara T. Bradford. For children - Roald Dahl. Romans, prehistoric animals and pets are most popular factual topics. 2 full-time and 2 part-time librarians issue 600 a day.
